page.title: 13FAIREY ENGINEERING LTD
page.content: Fairey Engineering is a factory in Heaton Chapel not far from our school.Fairey's used to make aeroplanes and parts for nuclear power stations.Now they specialize in portable metal bridges that are very light. Fairey's now use computer assisted design.They have a computer centre with a mainframe computer where draughtsmen design machinery and plans on computer screens.Another computer was plotting the shapes of components. The instructions were punched onto black tape. In the factory they have computer controlled machines which cut the components out of metal according to the instructions on the punched tape.
